content: Xiaoyu Wei is a postdoctoral researcher of scientific computing at Department of Computer Science, University of Illinois at Urbana-Chamapign. His research interests include integral equation methods and fast algorithms for numerical solution of PDEs, image processing, and building softwares for scientific computing.

title: 魏晓宇
